content: pattern is japanese but fully charted using standard knitting and/or crochet symbols for help using japanese charted patterns please visit the japanese knitting & crochet group 1 translation requests can be made in this thread 2 **materials ** * color a 15 g 45 meters * color b 30 g 90 meters * color c scraps * color d scraps * japanese size 5/0 crochet hook 3 0 mm 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/japanese-knitting-and-crochet 2 http //www ravelry com/discuss/pierrot-yarns/884508/
